Name: Bourbon Milk Punch
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Truly the milk of the Gods! Delicate bourbon with a touch of vanilla. Balanced rather than sweet, and milky rather than creamy.
History: This classic was popular during America's Prohibition era and is still widely served in New Orleans where it is commonly consumed with Sunday brunch.
Nutrition: One serving of Bourbon Milk Punch contains 227 calories
